page.title: 01 SUNDAY
page.content:
{A survey of a typical Sunday shows the {following information :-
Most children get up between 7.30am and 10.30am.
App. 50% of children put on the television or video as soon as they get up.
Only 10% have cooked breakfast.
Only two pupils from a class of thirty actually mentioned going to church or Sunday school.
Most pupils spent the day visiting relatives or friends.A few played organised sport in the morning. About 40% only have traditional Sunday dinner. The day again ended with television.
